def newCreateColorEntry(self, parent, category, text,
                            help = '', command = None,
                            side = tk.LEFT, fill = tk.X, expand = 0, **kw):
        # Create the widget
        widget = self.createWidget(parent, category, text,
                                   VectorWidgets.ColorEntry,
                                   help, command, side, fill, expand, kw)
        return widget
